titre: Joint FMs Statement on use of Chemical Weapons in Douma, Syria
description: The Foreign Secretary has made a joint statement on a report which found the Assad regime responsible for the deadly chemical weapons attack on Douma in 2018.

description: Strengthening Shared Understanding among the Partners in the Blue Pacific and Pacific Islands

titre: Empowering MINUSMA to adapt is essential to building peace and stability in Mali: UK Statement at the UN Security Council
description: Statement by Ambassador James Kariuki at the UN Security Council briefing on Mali

titre: Bird flu (avian influenza): latest situation in England
description: Find out about the latest bird flu situation in England and guidance for bird keepers and the public.

description: Gillian Keegan recognises the achievements of Church of England schools, and of teachers and leaders in schools across the country

titre: Mogadishu, Somalia terror attack: compensation for victims
description: How to apply for compensation if you were a victim of the terrorist attack in Mogadishu, Somalia on 27 November 2022.

titre: Students offered the chance to be a 'High Commissioner for the Week'
description: Cypriot school students can apply to shadow the British and Australian High Commissioners in Nicosia.

titre: World Trade Organisation's Dominican Republic Trade Policy Review, January 2023: UK statement
description: The UK's Permanent Representative to the WTO in Geneva gave a statement during Dominican Republic’s fifth WTO Trade Policy Review (TPR).

description: Dstl will host the 25th CWD Conference, bringing together international experts and promoting collaboration to achieve a future free from chemical weapons.

titre: Digital Secretary Michelle Donelan's speech at Bloomberg
description: Secretary of State Michelle Donelan delivered a speech at Bloomberg on the government's ambitions for UK tech.

titre: Confidence, risk-taking and well-being - UK supports young women

titre: 'Future Free From Hate’ immersive map trail launches on Holocaust Memorial Day
description: Today, on Holocaust Memorial Day 27 January 2023, the second immersive trail on the Foundation Stones Map - Future Free From Hate - is live.

titre: Rt Hon Chris Skidmore MP to support Patrick Vallance’s emerging tech review
description: Rt Hon Chris Skidmore has been appointed to help accelerate the development and deployment of emerging technologies in key UK growth sectors.

titre: Levelling Up Secretary in North East England to sign historic £1.4 billion devolution deal
description: A landmark devolution deal has been signed in North East England today by Levelling Up Secretary Michael Gove and eight local leaders in the region.
